header.title: wxBoxSizer

description.p: The basic idea behind a box sizer is that windows will most often be laid out in rather simple basic geometry, typically in a row or a column or several hierarchies of either.
For more information, please see overview_sizer_box.
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxSizer

desc.p: orient may be either of wxVERTICAL or wxHORIZONTAL for creating either a column sizer or a row sizer.

func.fsummary: Returns the orientation of the box sizer, either wxVERTICAL or wxHORIZONTAL.
